articles.description: Completing a daunting chase to win the second Test in Pakistan would be a bigger achievement that the run-filled victory in the first, according to England assistant coach Paul Collingwood.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Paul Collingwood says tourists winning second Test would be better than first

articles.description: West Ham midfielder Lucas Paqueta wants the Football Association to investigate "misleading" leaks about his betting case.
articles.title: Lucas Paqueta charges: Brazil midfielder wants Football Association to investigate 'misleading' leaks

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Twente vs Chelsea in the UEFA Women's Champions League
articles.title: Twente vs Chelsea: UEFA Women's Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: South Africa produce a stunning performance to knock Australia out of the Women's T20 World Cup in the semi-finals.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup results: Australia shocked by South Africa in semi-finals

articles.description: Max Verstappen says he will continue his stance of giving minimal answers in official Formula 1 news conferences at this weekend’s US Grand Prix.
articles.title: Max Verstappen to continue giving minimal answers at US Grand Prix news conferences

articles.description: Sheffield United manager Chris Wilder says his players have found it difficult to deal with the death of former team-mate George Baldock
articles.title: Chris Wilder: George Baldock tragedy has been 'difficult' for Sheffield United

articles.description: Bangladesh sack men's head coach Chandika Hathurusinghe for "misconduct" and "breach of employment terms".
articles.title: Bangladesh men's cricket team: Chandika Hathurusinghe sacked for "misconduct" and "breach of employment terms"

articles.description: BBC Sport charts the background to a secretive process which saw Thomas Tuchel announced as the new England manager.
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel new England manager: How did we get here so quickly and quietly?

articles.description: Artur Beterbiev has been ordered by the IBF to face a mandatory challenger.
articles.title: Boxing: Artur Beterbiev ordered to face IBF mandatory despite Dmitry Bivol appeal to sanctioning bodies

articles.description: England's path to a possible home Rugby World Cup triumph has been mapped out, with the hosts placed in a pool with Australia, USA, and Samoa for next summer's tournament.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup 2025 draw: England in pool with Australia, USA and Samoa
